text: ennal pisac avare atil ninn vyaticalippiccu. avar iruvarum anubhaviccirunnatil (sebhagyam) ninn avare puram tallukayum ceytu. nam (avareatâ€Œ) parannu: ninnal irannippeaku. ninnalil cilar cilarkk satrukkalakunnu. ninnalkk bhumiyil oru niscita kalam varekkum vasasthalavum jivitavibhavannalumuntayirikkum
